history.change: thrust_penalty 0.009→0.005: bot was idle 74-94% before deaths, needed more mobility. +67.5% avg_score.
fire_reward 1.5→1.7: attempted to reduce saucer bullet deaths via faster shooting. -38.6% avg_score. REVERTED.
edge_penalty 0.70→0.80: attempted to reduce edge deaths (3/9 near edge). -17.6% avg_score. Helped 3 worst seeds (+427-444%) but hurt 7 others (-7% to -61%). REVERTED.

lookahead_frames 22→24: attempted longer planning horizon for earlier threat detection. -65.4% avg_score. CATASTROPHIC — bot became paralyzed by too many simultaneous threats, lost 51% thrust and 54% fire. REVERTED.

action_penalty 0.009→0.007: attempted to reduce idleness (75-87%) by lowering cost of all actions. -44.0% avg_score. Paradoxically reduced activity by 32-38%. Same pattern: chaotic trio improved (+948%, +314%) while 7 seeds collapsed (-58% to -92%). REVERTED.

risk_weight_saucer 2.8→3.0: attempted to reduce saucer bullet deaths (82% of all deaths) by increasing saucer body avoidance. -49.0% avg_score. Same pattern: activity dropped 34-39%, chaotic trio improved (+415%, +63%, +32%), 8 good seeds collapsed (-13% to -81%). REVERTED.

Coordinated: risk_weight_asteroid 2.2→1.9 + turn_penalty 0.011→0.008. First multi-param attempt. Mildest regression yet (-33.4%) but still regressed. Turn_penalty change worked (more turning) but asteroid avoidance reduction hurt positioning. REVERTED.

turn_penalty 0.011→0.008: isolated the successful component from iter-007's failed 2-param attempt. First improvement since iter-001. +2.1% avg_score, +52% max_score. Bot turns ~97% more, thrusts 9% more, fires same. 5 seeds massively improved (+52% to +500%), 2 collapsed (-90% to -95%). NEW best.

survival_weight 3.2→3.4: attempted universal defensive boost without changing threat priorities. -5.7% avg_score. Activity dropped 11.4%. Dramatic seed shuffle: 0xBAAAAAAD +1030%, 0xE35B682C +640%, but 0x6046C93D -71%, 0x8BADF00D -79%. REVERTED.

speed_soft_cap 3.8→3.5: lower max speed for better edge control and turning synergy. +12.2% avg_score, +14% max_score. 7 seeds improved, 3 regressed, 2 unchanged. 0xDEADBEEF +805% (19K→176K). No activity paradox — activity unchanged (+0.5%). NEW best.
